example: I didn't go to school yesterday.
My wife and I take a walk on the beach every morning.

I watched the movie at home two days ago.

The island is small but very beautiful.
Only a few people like this painting.
The dark blue sea is so beautiful.
A: The guy stopped and looked at you. Do you know him? B: No, I don't.
A: Henry is not happy. What happened to him? B: I don't know.
Her dog was dead, and she was very sad.

There is a brown horse by the big tree.

Parents are always busy.
Do not swim in the river.
There are many beautiful fish in the lake.

Bears live in the mountains.
We seldom camp in the mountains in January.

I rowed a boat with my parents on the river.
My mom planted an apple tree for me.
Mr. Thompson hikes in the forest every weekend.
My friends and I didn't go on a picnic that day.
Yesterday was my friend's birthday, and we had a big meal last night.
Marie lives in a tree house with her family.
Kids often make new friends at the playground.
Annie really likes Toby. She knows everything about him.
Maggie changed her phone number a few days ago.
The company burned the rainforest and planted palm trees.

Tommy makes money for his family.
I miss my elementary school classmates.
The little girl over there is Tina's sister.
The ice turned into water little by little.
Ted goes to bed before 10 p.m. This way, he can have enough sleep.
